oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Electrochemically polymerized electroactive poly(3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene) containing covalently bound dopant ions: poly{2-(3-sodiumsulfinopropyl)-2,3-dihydrothieno[3,4-b][1,4]dioxin}
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: KRISHNAMOORTHY, K
KANUNGO, MANDAKINI
AMBADE, ASHOOTOSH V
CONTRACTOR, AQ
ANIL KUMAR
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: doping (additives)
electrochemistry
electropolymerization
homopolymerization
synthesis (chemical)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A self doped electroactive homopolymer where the counterion is covalently bound to the polymer chain, poly{2-(3-sodiumsulfinopropyl)-2,3-dihydrothieno[3,4-b][1,4]dioxin}, was synthesized electrochemically and its electrochemical and optical properties were studied.
